title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The path to Multimodal Artificial General Intelligence (STP102)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通往多模态通用人工智能之路 (STP102)
abstract: The evolution toward AGI isn't happening in text alone. It's unfolding across vision, motion, and understanding of our physical world. Drawing on Luma AI's Ray3 video generation model, we'll demonstrate how AI is creating coherent, physically plausible video content that's transforming industries from e-commerce and entertainment to brand marketing, advertising, and gaming. Through concrete use cases, we'll explore live deployments solving real business challenges: scaling creative asset production for retail, reimagining film and television workflows, and transforming agency operations. Whether you're building enterprise AI applications or planning your AI strategy, join us to see where multimodal AI is today and where we're heading tomorrow.
abstract_cn: 通向AGI的演进不仅仅发生在文本领域，它正在视觉、运动和对物理世界的理解等多个维度展开。借助Luma AI的Ray3视频生成模型，我们将展示AI如何创建连贯且符合物理规律的视频内容，这正在改变从电子商务、娱乐到品牌营销、广告和游戏等各个行业。通过具体的应用案例，我们将探讨正在解决实际业务挑战的实时部署：为零售业扩展创意资产生产、重新构想影视工作流程，以及转型代理机构运营。无论您是在构建企业AI应用还是规划AI战略，欢迎加入我们，了解多模态AI的现状以及未来发展方向。

presenter.name: Jason Levin
presenter.title: Director of Partnerships and Business Development
